name: Sigma AI Terminal
description: The Sigma AI Terminal, symbolized by the $sai token, is an innovative platform designed to blend humor derived from the "Sigma" meme culture with practical technology. Our project focuses on providing a decentralized coding environment where developers can collaborate, share, and deploy code directly on the blockchain. The platform leverages AI-driven tools to assist users in optimizing their code and managing projects efficiently, catering to the needs of independent developers and tech enthusiasts who appreciate both coding and meme culture. This unique combination aims to make coding more accessible and entertaining, fostering a community of 'Sigma' programmers who embody self-reliance and excellence in the tech world.
